When legions of monstrous creatures , known as Kaiju , began to emerge from the sea , began a war to end millions of lives and consume resources of mankind for years . To combat the giant Kaiju , a special type of weapon was created : giant robots , called Jaegers , controlled simultaneously by two pilots who have their minds locked in a neural bridge . But even show up Jaegers almost defenseless against the relentless Kaiju . On the verge of defeat, the forces defending mankind have no choice but to turn to two unlikely heroes - a forgotten former pilot ( Charlie Hunnam ) and an inexperienced apprentice ( Rinko Kikuchi ) - who join to command a legendary , but apparently obsolete , Jaeger past . Together , they represent the last hope of humanity against the apocalypse .
